Header.comment: This is an automatically generated file. Do not edit.

abs550aer_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Optical thickness of atmospheric aerosols at wavelength 550 nanometers.
abs550aer_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Ambient Aerosol Absorption Optical Thickness at 550nm

abs550bc_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: This is the black carbon aerosol optical depth at 550nm due to absorption

abs550dust_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: This is the dust aerosol optical depth at 550nm due to absorption

abs550no3_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: This is the nitrate aerosol optical depth at 550nm due to absorption

abs550oa_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: This is the particular organic matter aerosol optical depth at 550nm due to absorption

abs550so4_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: This is the sulphate aerosol optical depth at 550nm due to absorption

abs550ss_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: This is the sea salt aerosol optical depth at 550nm due to absorption

absscint_tavg-op4-hxy-sea.description: This is a fundamental aspect of the changes in the hydrological cycle and their impact on the oceans, and due to new numerical schemes and vertical discretizations, it is important to calculate it consistently with the model formulation.
absscint_tavg-op4-hxy-sea.ui-label: Integral wrt depth of seawater absolute salinity expressed as salt mass content

acabf_tavg-u-hxy-is.description: quantity averaged over ice sheet only, to avoid contamination from other surfaces (eg: permafrost)

agesno_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean (weighted by snow mass on land)
agesno_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.description: When computing the time-mean here, the time samples, weighted by the mass of snow on the land portion of the grid cell, are accumulated and then divided by the sum of the weights.  Reported as "missing in regions free of snow on land.

agessc_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
agessc_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.description: Time elapsed since water was last in surface layer of the ocean.
agessc_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.ui-label: Sea Water Age Since Surface Contact

airmass_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: The mass of air in an atmospheric layer.
airmass_tavg-al-hxy-u.ui-label: Vertically Integrated Mass Content of Air in Layer

albc_tavg-u-hxy-veg.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean

albisccp_tavg-u-hxy-cl.description: time-means weighted by the ISCCP Total Cloud Fraction - see <https://www.cfmip.org/tools-and-data/cosp>

albsrfc_tavg-u-hxy-sn.description: This is similar to Eday.albsn, but providing monthly averages

albsrfc_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: surface albedo at grid cell level (i.e. the albedo averaged over all potential subgrid-scale structures) over all wave-bands; this shall apply to all realms (land, ocean, sea ice, land ice)

aoanh_tavg-al-hxy-u.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ time: mean (weighted by tracer mass)
aoanh_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Fixed surface layer mixing ratio over 30o-50oN (0 ppbv), uniform fixed source (at all levels) everywhere else (source is unspecified but must be constant in space and time and documented). Note that the source could be 1yr/yr, so the tracer concentration provides mean age in years. For method using linearly increasing tracer include a method attribute: "linearly increasing tracer"For method using uniform source (1yr/yr) include a method attribute: "uniform source"

aod550volso4_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: This is the monthly averaged aerosol optical thickness at 550 nm due to stratospheric volcanic sulphate aerosols
aod550volso4_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Monthly Aerosol Optical Depth at 550nm Due to Stratospheric Volcanic Aerosols

arag_tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
arag_tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.description: sum of particulate aragonite components (e.g. Phytoplankton, Detrital, etc.)

arag_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
arag_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.description: sum of particulate aragonite components (e.g. Phytoplankton, Detrital, etc.)

areacell_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: When interpolated to a regular grid, it should be interpolated (not summed) with a conservative scheme to preserve total area
areacell_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: The Cell Area of the Ice Sheet Model

areacell_ti-u-hxy-u.description: Cell areas for any grid used to report river model variables (may be the same as for atmospheric variables). These cell areas should be defined to enable exact calculation of area integrals (e.g., of vertical fluxes of energy at the surface and top of the atmosphere).
areacell_ti-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Grid-Cell Area for River Model Variables

bacc_tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
bacc_tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.description: sum of bacterial carbon component concentrations

baresoilFrac_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Percentage of entire grid cell  that is covered by bare soil.

basin_ti-u-hxy-u.description: A variable with the standard name of region contains strings which indicate geographical regions. These strings must be chosen from the standard region list.

bigthetao_tavg-ol-hm-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
bigthetao_tavg-ol-hm-sea.description: Diagnostic should be contributed only for models using conservative temperature as prognostic field.
bigthetao_tavg-ol-hm-sea.ui-label: Global Average Sea Water Conservative Temperature

bigthetao_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
bigthetao_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.description: Diagnostic should be contributed only for models using conservative temperature as prognostic field.

bigthetao_tavg-op20bar-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
bigthetao_tavg-op20bar-hxy-sea.description: Diagnostic should be contributed even for models using conservative temperature as prognostic field.
bigthetao_tavg-op20bar-hxy-sea.ui-label: Sea Water Conservative Temperature at 200 meters

bldep_tmax-u-hxy-u.description: maximum boundary layer height during the day (add cell\_methods attribute: "time: maximum")

bldep_tmin-u-hxy-u.description: minimum boundary layer height during the day (add cell\_methods attribute: "time: minimum")

bry_tavg-p39-hy-air.description: Total family (the sum of all appropriate species in the model) ; list the species in the netCDF header, e.g. Bry = Br + BrO + HOBr + HBr + BrONO2 + BrCl Definition: Total inorganic bromine (e.g., HBr and inorganic bromine oxides and radicals (e.g., BrO, atomic bromine (Br), bromine nitrate (BrONO2)) resulting from degradation of bromine-containing organicsource gases (halons, methyl bromide, VSLS), and natural inorganic bromine sources (e.g., volcanoes, sea salt, and other aerosols) add comment attribute with detailed description about how the model calculates these fields
bry_tavg-p39-hy-air.ui-label: Total Inorganic Bromine Volume Mixing Ratio

bs550aer_tpt-al-hxy-u.description: Aerosol  Backscatter at wavelength 550nm and scattering angle 180 degrees, computed from extinction and lidar ratio

burntFractionAll_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Percentage of grid cell burned due to all fires including natural and anthropogenic fires and those associated with anthropogenic land use change
burntFractionAll_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Percentage of Entire Grid Cell That Is Covered by Burnt Vegetation (All Classes)

c13Land_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean
c13Land_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.description: Carbon-13 mass content per unit area in vegetation (any living plants e.g. trees, shrubs, grass), litter (dead plant material in or above the soil), soil, and forestry and agricultural products (e.g. paper, cardboard, furniture, timber for construction, biofuels and food for both humans and livestock).
c13Land_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.ui-label: Mass of 13C in All Terrestrial Carbon Pools

c13Litter_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean
c13Litter_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.description: Carbon-13 mass content per unit area litter (dead plant material in or above the soil).

c13Soil_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean
c13Soil_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.description: Carbon-13 mass content per unit area in soil.

c13Veg_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean
c13Veg_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.description: Carbon-13 mass content per unit area in vegetation (any living plants e.g. trees, shrubs, grass).

c14Land_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean
c14Land_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.description: Carbon-14 mass content per unit area in vegetation (any living plants e.g. trees, shrubs, grass), litter (dead plant material in or above the soil), soil, and forestry and agricultural products (e.g. paper, cardboard, furniture, timber for construction, biofuels and food for both humans and livestock).
c14Land_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.ui-label: Mass of 14C in All Terrestrial Carbon Pools

c14Litter_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean
c14Litter_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.description: Carbon-14 mass content per unit area litter (dead plant material in or above the soil).

c14Soil_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean
c14Soil_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.description: Carbon-14 mass content per unit area in soil.

c14Veg_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean

c2h4_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Mole fraction of ethene (C2H4) in air

c2h5oh_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Mole fraction of ethanol (C2H5OH) in air

c2h6_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

c3PftFrac_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Percentage of entire grid cell  that is covered by C3 PFTs (including grass, crops, and trees).
c3PftFrac_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Percentage Cover by C3 Plant Functional Type

c3h6_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

c3h8_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

c4PftFrac_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Percentage of entire grid cell  that is covered by C4 PFTs (including grass and crops).
c4PftFrac_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Percentage Cover by C4 Plant Functional Type

c4h10_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Mole fraction of butane (C4H10) in air

cGeologicStorage_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Mass of carbon that has been intentionally sequestered in geologic storage. The definition of geologic storage here is that it be stored for periods of time that are long as compared to the simulation.

cLand_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean
cLand_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.description: Report missing data over ocean grid cells. For fractional land report value averaged over the land fraction.
cLand_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.ui-label: Total Carbon in All Terrestrial Carbon Pools

cLeaf_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean
cLeaf_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.description: Carbon mass per unit area in leaves.

cLitterCwd_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean
cLitterCwd_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.description: "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Wood debris" means dead organic matter composed of coarse wood. It is distinct from fine litter. The precise distinction between "fine" and "coarse" is model dependent.
cLitterCwd_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.ui-label: Carbon Mass in Coarse Woody Debris

cLitterLut_tpt-u-hxy-multi.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sector time: point
cLitterLut_tpt-u-hxy-multi.description: end of year values (not annual mean)
cLitterLut_tpt-u-hxy-multi.ui-label: Carbon  in Above and Below-Ground Litter Pools on Land-Use Tiles

cLitterSubSurf_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean
cLitterSubSurf_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.description: subsurface litter pool fed by root inputs.

cLitterSurf_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean
cLitterSurf_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.description: Surface or near-surface litter pool fed by leaf and above-ground litterfall

cLitter_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean
cLitter_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.description: "Litter" is dead plant material in or above the soil. It is distinct from coarse wood debris. The precise distinction between "fine" and "coarse" is model dependent. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. The sum of the quantities with standard names surface\_litter\_mass\_content\_of\_carbon and subsurface\_litter\_mass\_content\_of\_carbon has the standard name litter\_mass\_content\_of\_carbon.

cOther_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean
cOther_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.ui-label: Carbon Mass in Vegetation Components Other than Leaves, Stems and Roots

cProductLut_tpt-u-hxy-multi.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sector time: point
cProductLut_tpt-u-hxy-multi.description: Anthropogenic pools associated with land use tiles into which harvests and cleared carbon are deposited before release into atmosphere PLUS any remaining anthropogenic pools that may be associated with lands which were converted into land use tiles during reported period. Examples of products include paper, cardboard, timber for construction, and crop harvest for food or fuel. Does NOT include residue which is deposited into soil or litter; end of year values (not annual mean).
cProductLut_tpt-u-hxy-multi.ui-label: Wood and Agricultural Product Pool Carbon Associated with Land-Use Tiles

cProduct_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean
cProduct_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.description: Carbon mass per unit area in that has been removed from the environment through  land use change.
cProduct_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.ui-label: Carbon Mass in Products of Land-Use Change

cRoot_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean

cSoilLut_tpt-u-hxy-multi.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sector time: point
cSoilLut_tpt-u-hxy-multi.description: end of year values (not annual mean)
cSoilLut_tpt-u-hxy-multi.ui-label: Carbon in Soil Pool on Land-Use Tiles

cSoilPools_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean
cSoilPools_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.description: For models with multiple soil carbon pools, report each pool here. If models also have vertical discretisation these should be aggregated
cSoilPools_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.ui-label: Carbon Mass in Each Model Soil Pool (Summed over Vertical Levels)

cSoil_tavg-d100cm-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean
cSoil_tavg-d100cm-hxy-lnd.description: Report missing data over ocean grid cells. For fractional land report value averaged over the land fraction.
cSoil_tavg-d100cm-hxy-lnd.ui-label: Carbon Mass in Soil Pool Above 1m Depth

cSoil_tavg-sl-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean
cSoil_tavg-sl-hxy-lnd.description: for models with vertically discretised soil carbon, report total soil carbon for each level
cSoil_tavg-sl-hxy-lnd.ui-label: Carbon Mass in Each Model Soil Level (Summed over All Soil Carbon Pools in That Level)

cSoil_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean
cSoil_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.description: Carbon mass in the full depth of the soil model.
cSoil_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.ui-label: Carbon Mass in Model Soil Pool

cStem_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean

cVegLut_tpt-u-hxy-multi.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sector time: point
cVegLut_tpt-u-hxy-multi.description: end of year values (not annual mean)
cVegLut_tpt-u-hxy-multi.ui-label: Carbon in Vegetation on Land-Use Tiles

cVeg_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean
cVeg_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.description: Carbon mass per unit area in vegetation.

cVeg_tavg-u-hxy-ng.description: "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Vegetation" means any plants e.g. trees, shrubs, grass. Plants are autotrophs i.e. "producers" of biomass using carbon obtained from carbon dioxide.
cVeg_tavg-u-hxy-ng.ui-label: Carbon Mass in Vegetation on Grass Tiles

cVeg_tavg-u-hxy-shb.description: "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Vegetation" means any plants e.g. trees, shrubs, grass. Plants are autotrophs i.e. "producers" of biomass using carbon obtained from carbon dioxide.
cVeg_tavg-u-hxy-shb.ui-label: Carbon Mass in Vegetation on Shrub Tiles

cVeg_tavg-u-hxy-tree.description: "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Vegetation" means any plants e.g. trees, shrubs, grass. Plants are autotrophs i.e. "producers" of biomass using carbon obtained from carbon dioxide.
cVeg_tavg-u-hxy-tree.ui-label: Carbon Mass in Vegetation on Tree Tiles

cWood_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean

calc_tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
calc_tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.description: sum of particulate calcite component concentrations (e.g. Phytoplankton, Detrital, etc.)

calc_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
calc_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.description: sum of particulate calcite component concentrations (e.g. Phytoplankton, Detrital, etc.)

ccb_tavg-u-hxy-ccl.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ time: mean where convective_cloud (weighted by total convective cloud area)
ccb_tavg-u-hxy-ccl.description: Where convective cloud is present in the grid cell, the instantaneous cloud base altitude should be that of the bottom of the lowest level containing convective cloud. Missing data should be reported in the absence of convective cloud. The time mean should be calculated from these quantities averaging over occasions when convective cloud is present only, and should contain missing data for occasions when no convective cloud is present during the meaning period.
ccb_tavg-u-hxy-ccl.ui-label: Air Pressure at Convective Cloud Base

ccb_tpt-u-hxys-u.description: Where convective cloud is present in the grid cell, the instantaneous cloud base altitude should be that of the bottom of the lowest level containing convective cloud. Missing data should be reported in the absence of convective cloud. The time mean should be calculated from these quantities averaging over occasions when convective cloud is present only, and should contain missing data for occasions when no convective cloud is present during the meaning period.
ccb_tpt-u-hxys-u.ui-label: Air Pressure at Convective Cloud Base

ccldncl_tavg-u-hxy-ccl.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ time: mean where convective_cloud (mean over the portion of the cell containing liquid topped cloud, as seen from top of atmosphere)
ccldncl_tavg-u-hxy-ccl.description: Cloud Droplet Number Concentration of Convective Cloud Tops
ccldncl_tavg-u-hxy-ccl.ui-label: Cloud Droplet Number Concentration of Convective Cloud Tops

ccn1_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: This is the concentration of cloud condensation nuclei (CCN) at 1.0 percent supersaturation, based on aerosol chemical composition and size

ccn_tavg-u-hxy-ccl.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ time: mean where convective_cloud (mean over the portion of the cell containing liquid topped cloud, as seen from top of atmosphere)
ccn_tavg-u-hxy-ccl.ui-label: Cloud Condensation Nuclei Concentration at Liquid Cloud Top

ccnp02_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: This is the concentration of cloud condensation nuclei (CCN) at 0.2% supersaturation, based on aerosol chemical composition and size

cct_tavg-u-hxy-ccl.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ time: mean where convective_cloud (weighted by total convective cloud area)
cct_tavg-u-hxy-ccl.description: Where convective cloud is present in the grid cell, the instantaneous cloud top altitude should be that of the top of the highest level containing convective cloud. Missing data should be reported in the absence of convective cloud. The time mean should be calculated from these quantities averaging over occasions when convective cloud is present only, and should contain missing data for occasions when no convective cloud is present during the meaning period.
cct_tavg-u-hxy-ccl.ui-label: Air Pressure at Convective Cloud Top

cct_tpt-u-hxys-u.description: Where convective cloud is present in the grid cell, the instantaneous cloud top altitude should be that of the top of the highest level containing convective cloud. Missing data should be reported in the absence of convective cloud. The time mean should be calculated from these quantities averaging over occasions when convective cloud is present only, and should contain missing data for occasions when no convective cloud is present during the meaning period.
cct_tpt-u-hxys-u.ui-label: Air Pressure at Convective Cloud Top

cdnc_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Cloud Droplet Number Concentration in liquid water clouds.

cfc113_tavg-u-hm-u.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ area: time: mean (with all samples weighted by the number of moles of air in the sample)
cfc113_tavg-u-hm-u.description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.  The chemical formula of CFC113 is CCl2FCClF2.  The IUPAC name for CFC113 is 1,1,2-trichloro-1,2,2-trifluoro-ethane.
cfc113_tavg-u-hm-u.ui-label: Global Mean Mole Fraction of CFC113

cfc114_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Mole fraction of cfc114 in air

cfc11_tavg-u-hm-u.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ area: time: mean (with all samples weighted by the number of moles of air in the sample)
cfc11_tavg-u-hm-u.description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.  The chemical formula of CFC11 is CFCl3.  The IUPAC name for CFC11 is trichloro-fluoro-methane.
cfc11_tavg-u-hm-u.ui-label: Global Mean Mole Fraction of CFC11

cfc12_tavg-u-hm-u.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ area: time: mean (with all samples weighted by the number of moles of air in the sample)
cfc12_tavg-u-hm-u.description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.  The chemical formula of CFC12 is CF2Cl2.  The IUPAC name for CFC12 is dichloro-difluoro-methane.
cfc12_tavg-u-hm-u.ui-label: Global Mean Mole Fraction of CFC12

ch3coch3_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Mole fraction is used in the construction "mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y", where X is a material constituent of Y. A chemical species denoted by X may be described by a single term such as "nitrogen" or a phrase such as "nox\_expressed\_as\_nitrogen". Acetone is an organic molecule with the chemical formula CH3CH3CO. The IUPAC name for acetone is propan-2-one. Acetone is a member of the group of organic compounds known as ketones. There are standard names for the ketone group as well as for some of the individual species.

ch3oh_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Mole fraction of methanol (CH3OH) in air

ch4_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

ch4_tavg-p19-hxy-air.description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

ch4_tavg-p39-hy-air.description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

ch4_tavg-u-hm-u.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ area: time: mean (with all samples weighted by the number of moles of air in the sample)
ch4_tavg-u-hm-u.description: Global Mean Mole Fraction of CH4
ch4_tavg-u-hm-u.ui-label: Global Mean Mole Fraction of CH4

ch4_tclm-p19-hxy-air.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where air time: mean within years time: mean over years
ch4_tclm-p19-hxy-air.description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

ch4_tclm-u-hm-u.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ area: time: mean (with all samples weighted by the number of moles of air in the sample)
ch4_tclm-u-hm-u.description: Global Mean Mole Fraction of CH4
ch4_tclm-u-hm-u.ui-label: Global Mean Mole Fraction of CH4

ch4losssoil_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Loss rate of methane from the atmosphere due to soil sink
ch4losssoil_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: loss of methane from the atmosphere due to biological consumption in the soil

ch4ref_ti-al-hxy-u.description: This is the methane mole fraction that is used in a diagnostic call to the model's radiation scheme. It is only applicable when a methane double call is active in the model.
ch4ref_ti-al-hxy-u.ui-label: Reference mole fraction of methane in air

chcint_tavg-op4-hxy-sea.description: This is the vertically-integrated heat content derived from conservative temperature (bigthetao).
chcint_tavg-op4-hxy-sea.ui-label: Depth Integrated Seawater Conservative Temperature Expressed As Heat Content

chegph2oo1d_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Primary production rate of the hydroxy (OH) radical via H2O+O1D

chepasoa_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Total Net Production of Anthropogenic Secondary Organic Aerosol

chepnh4_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Net chemical production rate of ammonium aerosol in the atmosphere.
chepnh4_tavg-al-hxy-u.ui-label: Net chemical production of ammonium aerosol

chepno3_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Net chemical production rate of nitrate aerosol in the atmosphere
chepno3_tavg-al-hxy-u.ui-label: Net chemical production of nitrate aerosol

chepsoa_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: If model lumps SOA emissions with POA, then the sum of POA and SOA emissions is reported as OA emissions. "mass" refers to the mass of primary organic matter, not mass of organic carbon alone.

chl_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.description: sum of chlorophyll from all phytoplankton group concentrations.  In most models this is equal to chldiat+chlmisc, that is the sum of "Diatom Chlorophyll Mass Concentration" plus "Other Phytoplankton Chlorophyll Mass Concentration"

chl_tavg-op20bar-hxy-sea.description: Sum of chlorophyll from all phytoplankton group concentrations. In most models this is equal to chldiat+chlmisc, that is the sum of Diatom Chlorophyll Mass Concentration and Other Phytoplankton Chlorophyll Mass Concentration

chlmisc_tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean

chlpico_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.ui-label: Mass Concentration of Picophytoplankton Expressed as Chlorophyll in Sea Water

ci_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Fraction of time that convection occurs in the grid cell. If native cell data is regridded, the area-weighted mean of the contributing cells should be reported.
ci_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Fraction of Time Convection Occurs in Cell

ci_tpt-u-hxys-u.description: Fraction of time that convection occurs in the grid cell .
ci_tpt-u-hxys-u.ui-label: Fraction of Time Convection Occurs in Cell

cl_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Percentage cloud cover, including both large-scale and convective cloud.

cl_tpt-al-hxys-u.description: Includes both large-scale and convective cloud.

clcalipso_tavg-220hPa-hxy-air.description: Percentage cloud cover in layer centred on 220hPa
clcalipso_tavg-220hPa-hxy-air.ui-label: CALIPSO High Level Cloud Area Percentage

clcalipso_tavg-560hPa-hxy-air.description: Percentage cloud cover in layer centred on 560hPa
clcalipso_tavg-560hPa-hxy-air.ui-label: CALIPSO Mid Level Cloud Cover Percentage

clcalipso_tavg-840hPa-hxy-air.description: Percentage cloud cover in layer centred on 840hPa
clcalipso_tavg-840hPa-hxy-air.ui-label: CALIPSO Low Level Cloud Cover Percentage

clcalipso_tavg-h40-hxy-air.description: Percentage cloud cover in CALIPSO standard atmospheric layers.

cldnci_tavg-u-hxy-cl.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ time: mean where cloud (mean over the portion of the cell containing ice topped cloud, as seen from top of atmosphere)
cldnci_tavg-u-hxy-cl.description: Concentration 'as seen from space' over ice-cloud portion of grid cell.  This is the value from uppermost model layer with ice cloud or, if available, it is the sum over all ice cloud tops, no matter where they occur, as long as they are seen from the top of the atmosphere. Weight by total ice cloud top fraction (as seen from TOA) of each time sample when computing monthly mean.
cldnci_tavg-u-hxy-cl.ui-label: Ice Crystal Number Concentration of Cloud Tops

cldncl_tavg-u-hxy-cl.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ time: mean where cloud (mean over the portion of the cell containing liquid topped cloud, as seen from top of atmosphere)
cldncl_tavg-u-hxy-cl.description: Droplets are liquid only.  Report concentration 'as seen from space' over liquid cloudy portion of grid cell.  This is the value from uppermost model layer with liquid cloud or, if available, it is better to sum over all liquid cloud tops, no matter where they occur, as long as they are seen from the top of the atmosphere. Weight by total liquid cloud top fraction of  (as seen from TOA) each time sample when computing monthly mean.
cldncl_tavg-u-hxy-cl.ui-label: Cloud Droplet Number Concentration of Cloud Tops

cldnvi_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Droplets are liquid only.  Values are weighted by liquid cloud fraction in each layer when vertically integrating, and for monthly means the samples are weighted by total liquid cloud fraction (as seen from TOA).

cli_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Calculated as the mass of cloud ice  in the grid cell divided by the mass of air (including the water in all phases) in the grid cell.  This includes precipitating hydrometeors ONLY if the precipitating hydrometeors affect the calculation of radiative transfer in model.

cli_tpt-al-hxys-u.description: Includes both large-scale and convective cloud. This is the mass of  cloud ice  in the grid cell divided by the mass of air (including the water in all phases) in the grid cell.  This includes precipitating hydrometeors ONLY if the precipitating hydrometeors affect the calculation of radiative transfer in model.

clic_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Calculated as the mass of convective cloud ice  in the grid cell divided by the mass of air (including the water in all phases) in the grid cell.  This includes precipitating hydrometeors ONLY if the precipitating hydrometeors affect the calculation of radiative transfer in model.
clic_tavg-al-hxy-u.ui-label: Mass Fraction of Convective Cloud Ice

clic_tpt-al-hxy-u.description: Calculated as the mass of convective cloud ice  in the grid cell divided by the mass of air (including the water in all phases) in the grid cell.  This includes precipitating hydrometeors ONLY if the precipitating hydrometeors affect the calculation of radiative transfer in model.
clic_tpt-al-hxy-u.ui-label: Mass Fraction of Convective Cloud Ice

clis_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Calculated as the mass of stratiform cloud ice  in the grid cell divided by the mass of air (including the water in all phases) in the grid cell.  This includes precipitating hydrometeors ONLY if the precipitating hydrometeors affect the calculation of radiative transfer in model.
clis_tavg-al-hxy-u.ui-label: Mass Fraction of Stratiform Cloud Ice

clis_tpt-al-hxy-u.description: Calculate as the mass of stratiform cloud ice  in the grid cell divided by the mass of air (including the water in all phases) in the grid cell.  Include precipitating hydrometeors ONLY if the precipitating hydrometeor affects the calculation of radiative transfer in model.
clis_tpt-al-hxy-u.ui-label: Mass Fraction of Stratiform Cloud Ice

clisccp_tavg-p7c-hxy-air.description: Percentage cloud cover in optical depth categories.

clivi_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: calculate mass of ice water in the column divided by the area of the column (not just the area of the cloudy portion of the column). This includes precipitating frozen hydrometeors ONLY if the precipitating hydrometeors affect the calculation of radiative transfer in model.

clivi_tpt-u-hxy-u.description: mass of ice water in the column divided by the area of the column (not just the area of the cloudy portion of the column). Includes precipitating frozen hydrometeors ONLY if the precipitating hydrometeor affects the calculation of radiative transfer in model.

clivi_tpt-u-hxys-u.description: mass of ice water in the column divided by the area of the column (not just the area of the cloudy portion of the column). Includes precipitating frozen hydrometeors ONLY if the precipitating hydrometeor affects the calculation of radiative transfer in model.

clivic_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: calculate mass of convective ice water in the column divided by the area of the column (not just the area of the cloudy portion of the column). This includes precipitating frozen hydrometeors ONLY if the precipitating hydrometeors affect the calculation of radiative transfer in model.

clivimodis_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Mass of ice water in the column divided by the area of the column (not just the area of the cloudy portion of the column) as seen by the MODIS instrument simulator.

clmisr_tavg-h16-hxy-air.ui-label: Percentage Cloud Cover as Calculated by the MISR Simulator (Including Error Flag)

clmodisiceReff_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Percentage ice-cloud cover as seen by the MODIS instrument simulator. Dimensions of cloud IWP (cloud ice water path) and r\_eff (effective droplet size). The effective radius bin edges are defined in the COSP simulator (see lines 134-152 of cosp\_config.F90: <https://github.com/CFMIP/COSPv2.0/blob/master/src/cosp_config.F90>)
clmodisiceReff_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: MODIS Ice Topped Cloud Area Fraction

clmodisice_tavg-p7c-hxy-air.description: MODIS Ice Topped Cloud Area Percentage
clmodisice_tavg-p7c-hxy-air.ui-label: MODIS Ice Topped Cloud Area Fraction

clmodisliquidReff_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Percentage liquid-cloud cover as seen by the MODIS instrument simulator. Dimensions of LWP (cloud liquid water path) and r\_eff (droplet effective radius). The effective radius bin edges are defined in the COSP simulator (see lines 134-152 of cosp\_config.F90: <https://github.com/CFMIP/COSPv2.0/blob/master/src/cosp_config.F90>)
clmodisliquidReff_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: MODIS Liquid Topped Cloud Area Fraction

clmodisliquid_tavg-p7c-hxy-air.description: MODIS Liquid Topped Cloud Area Percentage
clmodisliquid_tavg-p7c-hxy-air.ui-label: MODIS Liquid Topped Cloud Area Fraction

cls_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Cloud area fraction (reported as a percentage) for the whole atmospheric column due to stratiform clouds, as seen from the surface or the top of the atmosphere. Includes both large-scale and convective cloud.

clt_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean

clt_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Total cloud area fraction (reported as a percentage) for the whole atmospheric column, as seen from the surface or the top of the atmosphere. Includes both large-scale and convective cloud.

clt_tpt-u-hxy-u.description: for the whole atmospheric column, as seen from the surface or the top of the atmosphere. Include both large-scale and convective cloud.

clt_tpt-u-hxys-u.description: for the whole atmospheric column, as seen from the surface or the top of the atmosphere. Include both large-scale and convective cloud.

cltcalipso_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Total cloud area fraction (reported as a percentage) for the whole atmospheric column, as seen by the  Cloud-Aerosol Lidar and Infrared Pathfinder Satellite Observation (CALIPSO) instrument. Includes both large-scale and convective cloud.

cltisccp_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Total cloud area fraction (reported as a percentage) for the whole atmospheric column, as seen by the International Satellite Cloud Climatology Project (ISCCP) analysis. Includes both large-scale and convective cloud.  (MODIS). Includes both large-scale and convective cloud.

cltmodis_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Percentage of total cloud cover as seen by the MODIS instrument simulator.

clw_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Includes both large-scale and convective cloud.  Calculate as the mass of cloud liquid water in the grid cell divided by the mass of air (including the water in all phases) in the grid cells. Precipitating hydrometeors are included ONLY if the precipitating hydrometeors affect the calculation of radiative transfer in model.
clw_tavg-al-hxy-u.ui-label: Mass Fraction of Cloud Liquid Water

clw_tpt-al-hxys-u.description: Includes both large-scale and convective cloud.  This is the mass of  cloud liquid water in the grid cell divided by the mass of air (including the water in all phases) in the grid cell.  This includes precipitating hydrometeors ONLY if the precipitating hydrometeors affect the calculation of radiative transfer in model.
clw_tpt-al-hxys-u.ui-label: Mass Fraction of Cloud Liquid Water

clwc_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Calculated as the mass of convective cloud liquid water in the grid cell divided by the mass of air (including the water in all phases) in the grid cell.  This includes precipitating hydrometeors ONLY if the precipitating hydrometeors affect the calculation of radiative transfer in model.
clwc_tavg-al-hxy-u.ui-label: Mass Fraction of Convective Cloud Liquid Water

clwc_tpt-al-hxy-u.description: Calculated as the mass of convective cloud liquid water in the grid cell divided by the mass of air (including the water in all phases) in the grid cell.  This includes precipitating hydrometeors ONLY if the precipitating hydrometeors affect the calculation of radiative transfer in model.
clwc_tpt-al-hxy-u.ui-label: Mass Fraction of Convective Cloud Liquid Water

clws_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Calculated as the mass of stratiform cloud liquid water in the grid cell divided by the mass of air (including the water in all phases) in the grid cell.  This includes precipitating hydrometeors ONLY if the precipitating hydrometeors affect the calculation of radiative transfer in model.
clws_tavg-al-hxy-u.ui-label: Mass Fraction of Stratiform Cloud Liquid Water

clws_tpt-al-hxy-u.description: Calculated as the mass of stratiform cloud liquid water in the grid cell divided by the mass of air (including the water in all phases) in the grid cell.  This includes precipitating hydrometeors ONLY if the precipitating hydrometeors affect the calculation of radiative transfer in model.
clws_tpt-al-hxy-u.ui-label: Mass Fraction of Stratiform Cloud Liquid Water

clwvi_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: mass of condensed (liquid + ice) water in the column divided by the area of the column (not just the area of the cloudy portion of the column). Includes precipitating hydrometeors ONLY if the precipitating hydrometeor affects the calculation of radiative transfer in model.

clwvi_tpt-u-hxy-u.description: mass of condensed (liquid + ice) water in the column divided by the area of the column (not just the area of the cloudy portion of the column). Includes precipitating hydrometeors ONLY if the precipitating hydrometeor affects the calculation of radiative transfer in model.

clwvi_tpt-u-hxys-u.description: mass of condensed (liquid + ice) water in the column divided by the area of the column (not just the area of the cloudy portion of the column). Includes precipitating hydrometeors ONLY if the precipitating hydrometeor affects the calculation of radiative transfer in model.

clwvic_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: calculate mass of convective condensed (liquid + ice) water in the column divided by the area of the column (not just the area of the cloudy portion of the column). This includes precipitating hydrometeors ONLY if the precipitating hydrometeors affect the calculation of radiative transfer in model.

clwvimodis_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Mass of condensed (liquid + ice) water in the column divided by the area of the column (not just the area of the cloudy portion of the column) as seen by the MODIS instrument simulator.

cly_tavg-p39-hy-air.description: Total family (the sum of all appropriate species in the model) ; list the species in the netCDF header, e.g. Cly = HCl + ClONO2 + HOCl + ClO + Cl + 2\*Cl2O2 +2Cl2 + OClO + BrCl Definition: Total inorganic stratospheric chlorine (e.g., HCl, ClO) resulting from degradation of chlorine-containing source gases (CFCs, HCFCs, VSLS), and natural inorganic chlorine sources (e.g., sea salt and other aerosols) add comment attribute with detailed description about how the model calculates these fields
cly_tavg-p39-hy-air.ui-label: Total Inorganic Chlorine Volume Mixing Ratio

cnc_tavg-u-hxy-u.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean

co2_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

co2_tavg-h2m-hxy-u.description: As co2, but only at the surface

co2_tavg-p19-hxy-air.description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

co2_tclm-p19-hxy-air.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where air time: mean within years time: mean over years
co2_tclm-p19-hxy-air.description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

co2_tclm-u-hm-u.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ sum (through atmospheric column) area: sum time: mean within years time: mean over years
co2_tclm-u-hm-u.description: Total atmospheric mass of Carbon Dioxide

co2mass_tavg-u-hm-u.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ sum (through atmospheric column) area: sum time: mean
co2mass_tavg-u-hm-u.description: Total atmospheric mass of Carbon Dioxide

co3_tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
co3_tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.description: Near surface mole concentration (number of moles per unit volume: molarity) of the carbonate anion (CO3).

co3_tavg-op20bar-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
co3_tavg-op20bar-hxy-sea.description: Mole concentration (number of moles per unit volume: molarity) of the carbonate anion (CO3).

co3satarag_tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
co3satarag_tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.description: Near surface mole concentration (number of moles per unit volume: molarity) of the carbonate anion (CO3) for sea water in equilibrium with pure Aragonite. Aragonite (CaCO3) is a mineral that is a polymorph of calcium carbonate.
co3satarag_tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.ui-label: Surface Mole Concentration of Carbonate Ion in Equilibrium with Pure Aragonite in Sea Water

co3satarag_tavg-op20bar-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
co3satarag_tavg-op20bar-hxy-sea.description: Mole concentration (number of moles per unit volume: molarity) of the carbonate anion (CO3) for sea water in equilibrium with pure Aragonite. Aragonite (CaCO3) is a mineral that is a polymorph of calcium carbonate.
co3satarag_tavg-op20bar-hxy-sea.ui-label: Mole Concentration of Carbonate Ion in Equilibrium with Pure Aragonite in Sea Water

co_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

co_tavg-h2m-hxy-u.description: This is the daily mean for CO volume mixing ratio in lowest model layer

cod_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: The optical thickness is the integral along the path of radiation of a volume scattering/absorption/attenuation coefficient. The radiative flux is reduced by a factor exp(-optical\_thickness) on traversing the path. A coordinate variable of radiation\_wavelength or radiation\_frequency can be specified to indicate that the optical thickness applies at specific wavelengths or frequencies. The atmosphere optical thickness applies to radiation passing through the entire atmosphere. "Cloud" means the component of extinction owing to the presence of liquid or ice water particles. The specification of a physical process by the phrase due\_to\_process means that the quantity named is a  single term in a sum of terms which together compose the general quantity named by omitting the phrase.

conccn_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: This is the number concentration of air particles in air

conccn_tpt-u-hxys-u.description: The variable represents the instantaneous Aerosol Number Concentration at CF sites, sampled every 3 hours
conccn_tpt-u-hxys-u.ui-label: Sub-daily Aerosol Number Concentration at CF sites

cropFracC3_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Percentage of entire grid cell covered by C3 crops

cropFracC4_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Percentage of entire grid cell covered by C4 crops

cropFrac_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Percentage of entire grid cell  that is covered by crop.

dcw_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean

depdust_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Fdry mass deposition rate of dust

depthl_ti-u-hxy-u.description: Depth of lakes, if this quantity is present in the model. If computed via volume and area, then this is lake volume divided by lake area.
depthl_ti-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Depth of Lake Below the Surface

deptho_ti-u-hxy-sea.description: Ocean bathymetry. Reported here is the sea floor depth for present day relative to z=0 geoid. Reported as missing for land grid cells.

depthsl_ti-u-hxy-u.description: Total (cumulative) thickness of all soil layers. This is the sum of individual thicknesses of all soil layers.
depthsl_ti-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Total (Cumulative) Thickness of All Soil Layers

detoc_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
detoc_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.description: sum of detrital organic carbon component concentrations

dfe_tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
dfe_tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.description: dissolved iron in sea water is meant to include both Fe2+ and Fe3+ ions (but not, e.g., particulate detrital iron)

dfe_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
dfe_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.description: dissolved iron in sea water is meant to include both Fe2+ and Fe3+ ions (but not, e.g., particulate detrital iron)

dgw_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean

difmxybo_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
difmxybo_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.description: Lateral biharmonic viscosity applied to the momentum equations.

difmxylo_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
difmxylo_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.description: Lateral Laplacian viscosity applied to the momentum equations.

diftrblo_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
diftrblo_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.description: Ocean tracer diffusivity associated with parameterized eddy-induced advective transport. Sometimes this diffusivity is called the "thickness" diffusivity. For CMIP5, this diagnostic was called "ocean tracer bolus laplacian diffusivity".  The CMIP6 name is physically more relevant.
diftrblo_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.ui-label: Ocean Tracer Diffusivity Due to Parameterized Mesoscale Advection

diftrelo_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
diftrelo_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.description: Ocean tracer diffusivity associated with parameterized eddy-induced diffusive transport oriented along neutral or isopycnal directions. Sometimes this diffusivity is called the neutral diffusivity or isopycnal diffusivity or Redi diffusivity.

difvho_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
difvho_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.description: Vertical/dianeutral diffusivity applied to prognostic temperature field.

difvso_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
difvso_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.description: Vertical/dianeutral diffusivity applied to prognostic salinity field.

dispkexyfo_tavg-u-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
dispkexyfo_tavg-u-hxy-sea.description: Depth integrated impacts on kinetic energy arising from lateral frictional dissipation associated with Laplacian and/or biharmonic viscosity. For CMIP5, this diagnostic was 3d, whereas the CMIP6 depth integrated diagnostic is sufficient for many purposes and reduces archive requirements.
dispkexyfo_tavg-u-hxy-sea.ui-label: Ocean Kinetic Energy Dissipation per Unit Area Due to XY Friction

dissi13c_tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean

dissi13c_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean

dissi14c_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean

dissi14cabio_tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean

dissi14cabio_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean

dissic_tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean

dissic_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean

dissoc_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
dissoc_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.description: Sum of dissolved carbon component concentrations explicitly represented (i.e. not ~40 uM refractory unless explicit)

dmc_tavg-alh-hxy-u.description: The net mass flux  represents the difference between the updraft and downdraft components.   This is calculated as the convective mass flux divided by the area of the whole grid cell (not just the area of the cloud).

dms_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

dmso_tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
dmso_tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.description: Mole concentration of dimethyl sulphide in water in the near surface layer
dmso_tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.ui-label: Surface Mole Concentration of Dimethyl Sulphide in Sea Water

dmso_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
dmso_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.description: Mole concentration of dimethyl sulphide in water
dmso_tavg-ol-hxy-sea.ui-label: Mole Concentration of Dimethyl Sulphide in Sea Water

do3chm_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Net chemical production of ozone in the atmosphere

dpco2_tavg-u-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
dpco2_tavg-u-hxy-sea.description: Difference in partial pressure of carbon dioxide between sea water and air.  The partial pressure of a dissolved gas in sea water is the partial pressure in air with which it would be in equilibrium.

dpo2_tavg-u-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
dpo2_tavg-u-hxy-sea.description: The partial pressure of a dissolved gas in sea water is the partial pressure in air with which it would be in equilibrium.  The partial pressure of a gaseous constituent of air is the pressure which it alone would exert with unchanged temperature and number of moles per unit volume.  The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere.

drivw_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean

drybc_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Dry Deposition Rate of Black Carbon Aerosol Mass
drybc_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Dry Deposition Rate of Black Carbon Aerosol Mass

dryh2_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: This is the total loss rate of molecular hydrogen (H2) from the atmosphere via its soil sink due to bacterial consumption.
dryh2_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Total loss rate of molecular hydrogen (H2) from the atmosphere via soil sink

dryhno3_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: This is the loss of nitric acid (HNO3) from the atmosphere due to dry deposition

drynh3_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Monthly Dry Deposition Rate of NH3 at surface

dryno3_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Loss rate of nitrate (NO3) aerosol from the atmosphere due to dry deposition

drynoy_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Daily Dry Deposition Rate of NOy at surface. Vertically integrated throughout the column to the surface.
drynoy_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Daily Dry Deposition Rate of NOy

dryoa_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Dry Deposition Rate of Dry Aerosol Total Organic Matter
dryoa_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Dry Deposition Rate of Dry Aerosol Total Organic Matter

dryss_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Dry Deposition Rate of Sea-Salt Aerosol
dryss_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Dry Deposition Rate of Sea-Salt Aerosol

dslw_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean

dsn_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean

dsw_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean

dtauc_tpt-al-hxy-ccl.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where convective_cloud time: point
dtauc_tpt-al-hxy-ccl.description: This is the in-cloud optical depth obtained by considering only the cloudy portion of the grid cell

dtaus_tpt-al-hxy-scl.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where stratiform_cloud time: point
dtaus_tpt-al-hxy-scl.description: This is the in-cloud optical depth obtained by considering only the cloudy portion of the grid cell.

dxto_ti-u-hxy-u.description: The linear extent of the cell in the x direction of the horizontal grid centered at t-points (points for tracers such as temperature, salinity, etc.). Not applicable to unstructured grids.
dxto_ti-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Cell Length in the X Direction at t-points

dxuo_ti-u-hxy-u.description: The linear extent of the cell in the x direction of the horizontal grid centered at u-points (points for velocity in the x-direction). Not applicable to unstructured grids.
dxuo_ti-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Cell Length in the X Direction at u-points

dxvo_ti-u-hxy-u.description: The linear extent of the cell in the x direction of the horizontal grid centered at v-points (points for velocity in the y-direction). Not applicable to unstructured grids.
dxvo_ti-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Cell Length in the X Direction at v-points

dyto_ti-u-hxy-u.description: The linear extent of the cell in the y direction of the horizontal grid centered at t-points (points for tracers such as temperature, salinity, etc.). Not applicable to unstructured grids.
dyto_ti-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Cell Length in the Y Direction at t-points

dyuo_ti-u-hxy-u.description: The linear extent of the cell in the y direction of the horizontal grid centered at u-points (points for velocity in the x-direction). Not applicable to unstructured grids.
dyuo_ti-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Cell Length in the Y Direction at u-points

dyvo_ti-u-hxy-u.description: The linear extent of the cell in the y direction of the horizontal grid centered at v-points (points for velocity in the y-direction). Not applicable to unstructured grids.
dyvo_ti-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Cell Length in the Y Direction at v-points

e90inst_tpt-al-hxy-u.description: Mole fraction of an artificial tracer with a 90-day lifetime (e90)

ec550aer_tavg-al-hxy-u.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ time: mean (weighted by downwelling solar radiation)

ec550aer_tpt-u-hxy-u.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean (weighted by downwelling solar radiation) time: point

edt_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Vertical diffusion coefficient for temperature due to parametrised eddies

edt_tpt-al-hxys-u.description: Vertical diffusion coefficient for temperature due to parametrised eddies

emiach4_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Anthropogenic emission rate of methane (CH4) into the atmosphere

emiaco_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Total Emission Rate of Anthropogenic CO

emianox_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Total Emission Rate of Anthropogenic NOx

emiaoa_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Total Emission Rate of Anthropogenic Organic Aerosol

emiavnox_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Emission rate of NOx from aircraft
emiavnox_tavg-al-hxy-u.ui-label: Emission rate of NOx from aviation

emibbch4_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Total emission rate of methane (CH4) into the atmosphere from all biomass burning (natural and anthropogenic)
emibbch4_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: total emission of CH4 from all biomass burning

emibbco_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Total emission rate of carbon monoxide (CO) into the atmosphere from all biomass burning (natural and anthropogenic)
emibbco_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: total emission rate of CO from all biomass burning

emibbdms_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Total emission rate of dimethyl sulfide (DMS) into the atmosphere from all biomass burning (natural and anthropogenic)
emibbdms_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: total emission of DMS from all biomass burning

emibbnh3_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Total emission rate of ammonia (NH3) into the atmosphere from all biomass burning (natural and anthropogenic)
emibbnh3_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: total emission rate of NH3 from all biomass burning

emibbnox_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Total emission rate of nitrogen oxides (NOx) from all biomass burning (natural and anthropogenic)
emibbnox_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: total emission rate of NOx from all biomass burning

emibboa_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Total emission rate of particulate organic matter (organic aerosol) into the atmosphere from all biomass burning (natural and anthropogenic)
emibboa_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: total emission of organic aerosol from all biomass burning

emibbso2_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Total emission rate of SO2 into the atmosphere from all biomass burning (natural and anthropogenic).
emibbso2_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: total emission rate of SO2 from all biomass burning

emibbvoc_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Total emission rate of non-methane volatile organic compounds (NMVOCs) from all biomass burning (natural and anthropogenic)
emibbvoc_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: total emission rate of NMVOC from all biomass burning

emibc_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.
emibc_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Total Emission Rate of Black Carbon Aerosol Mass

emibvoc_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.\_If\_ fixed molecular weight of NMVOC is not available in model, please provide in units of kilomole m-2 s-1 (i.e. kg m-2 s-1 as if model NMVOC had molecular weight of 1) and add a comment to your file.
emibvoc_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Total Emission Rate of Biogenic NMVOC

emic2h4_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Total emission rate of ethene (C2H4) into the atmosphere

emic2h5oh_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: This is the total emission rate of ethanol (C2H5OH) into the atmosphere

emic2h6_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: This is the total emission rate of ethane (C2H6) into the atmosphere

emic3h6_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: This is the total emission rate of propene (C3H6) into the atmosphere

emic3h8_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: This is the total emission rate of propane (C3H8) into the atmosphere

emic4h10_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: This is the total emission rate of butane (C4H10) into the atmosphere

emich3oh_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: This is the total emission rate of methanol (CH3OH) into the atmosphere

emich4_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: This is the total emission rate of methane (CH4) into the atmosphere

emico_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.

emidms_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.

emidust_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.

emih2_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: This is the total emission rate of molecular hydrogen (H2) into the atmosphere (i.e., integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field)
emih2_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Total emission rate of molecular hydrogen (H2)

emiisop_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field

emilkch4_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: This is the emission rate of methane (CH4) into the atmosphere from freshwater lakes

emilnox_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Integrate the NOx production for lightning over model layer. proposed name: tendency\_of\_atmosphere\_mass\_content\_of\_nox\_from\_lightning

eminh3_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.

eminox_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Store flux as Nitrogen. NOx=NO+NO2. Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.

emioa_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: This is the sum of total emission of POA and total production of SOA (emipoa+chepsoa). "Mass" refers to the mass of organic matter, not mass of organic carbon alone. We recommend a scale factor of POM=1.4\*OC, unless your model has more detailed info available.  Integrate 3D chemical production and emission field vertically to 2d field.
emioa_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Primary Emission and Chemical Production of Dry Aerosol Organic Matter

emiso2_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.

emiso4_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Direct primary emission does not include secondary sulfate production. Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.
emiso4_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Total Direct Emission Rate of SO4

emiss_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.
emiss_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Total Emission Rate of Sea-Salt Aerosol

emivoc_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field. \_If\_ fixed molecular weight of NMVOC is not available in model, please provide in units of kilomole m-2 s-1 (i.e. kg m-2 s-1 as if model NMVOC had molecular weight of 1) and add a comment to your file.

epfy_tavg-p39-hy-air.ui-label: Northward Component of the Eliassen-Palm Flux

epfz_tavg-p39-hy-air.ui-label: Upward Component of the Eliassen-Palm Flux

epn_tavg-d100m-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
epn_tavg-d100m-hxy-sea.description: In accordance with common usage in geophysical disciplines, "flux" implies per unit area, called "flux density" in physics.   'Sinking' is the gravitational settling of particulate matter suspended in a liquid. A sinking flux is positive downwards and is calculated relative to the movement of the surrounding fluid.

epp_tavg-d100m-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
epp_tavg-d100m-hxy-sea.description: In accordance with common usage in geophysical disciplines, "flux" implies per unit area, called "flux density" in physics.   'Sinking' is the gravitational settling of particulate matter suspended in a liquid. A sinking flux is positive downwards and is calculated relative to the movement of the surrounding fluid.

epsi_tavg-d100m-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
epsi_tavg-d100m-hxy-sea.description: In accordance with common usage in geophysical disciplines, "flux" implies per unit area, called "flux density" in physics.   'Sinking' is the gravitational settling of particulate matter suspended in a liquid. A sinking flux is positive downwards and is calculated relative to the movement of the surrounding fluid.

esn_tavg-u-hxy-sn.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean

evspsbl_tavg-u-hxy-ifs.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where ice_free_sea over sea time: mean
evspsbl_tavg-u-hxy-ifs.description: computed as the total mass of water vapor evaporating from the ice-free portion of the ocean  divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.
evspsbl_tavg-u-hxy-ifs.ui-label: Water Evaporation Flux Where Ice Free Ocean over Sea

evspsbl_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean
evspsbl_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.description: Evaporation at surface (also known as evapotranspiration): flux of water into the atmosphere due to conversion of both liquid and solid phases to vapor (from underlying surface and vegetation)

evspsbl_tavg-u-hxy-si.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
evspsbl_tavg-u-hxy-si.description: Rate of change of sea-ice mass change through evaporation and sublimation divided by grid-cell area. If a model does not differentiate between the sublimation of snow and sea ice, we recommend to report sidmassevapsubl as zero as long as the ice is snow covered, and to report any sublimation within the variable sisndmasssubl.
evspsbl_tavg-u-hxy-si.ui-label: Sea-Ice Mass Change Through Evaporation and Sublimation

evspsbl_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: at surface; flux of water into the atmosphere due to conversion of both liquid and solid phases to vapor (from underlying surface and vegetation)

evspsbl_tpt-u-hxys-u.description: at surface; flux of water into the atmosphere due to conversion of both liquid and solid phases to vapor (from underlying surface and vegetation)

evspsblpot_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean
evspsblpot_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.description: at surface; potential flux of water into the atmosphere due to conversion of both liquid and solid phases to vapor (from underlying surface and vegetation)

evspsblsoi_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean

evspsblsoi_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: Water evaporation flux from soil but for daily averages i.e., the evspsblsoi variable, which is only currently defined for monthly averages
evspsblsoi_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Daily water evaporation flux from soil

evspsblveg_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where land time: mean
evspsblveg_tavg-u-hxy-lnd.description: the canopy evaporation+sublimation (if present in model).

evspsblveg_tavg-u-hxy-u.description: The same as the current variable evspsblveg but defined on daily timescales.
evspsblveg_tavg-u-hxy-u.ui-label: Daily water evaporation flux from canopy

evu_tavg-al-hxy-u.description: Vertical diffusion coefficient for momentum due to parametrised eddies

exparagob_tavg-u-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
exparagob_tavg-u-hxy-sea.description: Downward sinking flux of aragonite at seafloor
exparagob_tavg-u-hxy-sea.ui-label: Sinking Flux of Aragonite Reaching the Ocean Bottom

expc_tavg-d1000m-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean
expc_tavg-d1000m-hxy-sea.description: The phrase 'expressed\_as' is used in the construction A\_expressed\_as\_B, where B is a chemical constituent of A. It means that the quantity indicated by the standard name is calculated solely with respect to the B contained in A, neglecting all other chemical constituents of A. In accordance with common usage in geophysical disciplines, "flux" implies per unit area, called "flux density" in physics.   'Sinking' is the gravitational settling of particulate matter suspended in a liquid. A sinking flux is positive downwards and is calculated relative to the movement of the surrounding fluid.
expc_tavg-d1000m-hxy-sea.ui-label: Downward Flux of Particulate Organic Carbon at 1000m

expc_tavg-d100m-hxy-sea.cell-methods: vr:cell-method/ mean where sea time: mean

It means that the quantity indicated by the standard name is calculated solely with respect to the B contained in A, neglecting all other chemical constituents of A. In accordance with common usage in geophysical disciplines, "flux" implies per unit area, called "flux density" in physics. It means that the quantity indicated by the standard name is calculated solely with respect to the B contained in A, neglecting all other chemical constituents of A. In accordance with common usage in geophysical disciplines, "flux" implies per unit area, called "flux density" in physics.   'Sinking' is the gravitational settling of particulate matter suspended in a liquid. A sinking flux is positive downwards and is calculated relative to the movement of the surrounding fluid. Calcite is a mineral that is a polymorph of calcium carbonate. The chemical formula of calcite is CaCO3. Standard names also exist for aragonite, another polymorph of calcium carbonate.

expnob_tavg-u-hxy-sea.ui-label: Sinking Flux of Particulate Organic Nitrogen Reaching the Ocean Bottom
